text:
Aside from your 'time limit' i felt transformation was the same as the other games: you became a badass.

Well, each to their own i guess. I personally loved the gritty atmosphere, and the unique battle system. I've only seen similar ones in Hyperdimension Neptunia and Valkyria Chronicles.
